alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benton, northern Madison, southern Carroll and northern Washington Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 430 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles west of Gentry to 5 miles northeast of Springdale to Rudd. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Huntsville... Lowell... Farmington... Gentry... Green Forest... Elkins... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Decatur... Highfill... Springtown... Hindsville... Wesley... Carrollton... Rudd... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 60 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
